ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Fully agreed on the 45 song issue. So far the only use I ve found for it is keeping newbies in the newbie zones from getting hit by mobs (magical skin magical
ygData.messageBody:
Fully agreed on the 45 song issue. So far the only use I've found for it is
keeping newbies in the newbie zones from getting hit by mobs (magical skin
magical skin bleh). They take no dmg whatsoever =P

I had a 50th rogue friend of mine duel a 49th necro pet. She was dual
wielding a bone razor + eyerazzia. The pet was wielding nothing. She won the
fight, but even with the song up she still got a good chunk of her ass
removed by Jobaber.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan

>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
>Date: Wed, 12 Apr 2000 11:04:42 -0400
>
>it's the other way around. Charm is the 39 song and Provocation is the 45
>song. also, the charm does work on 37+ mobs (i charmed a Seafury Cyclops
>to
>kill another), and it does not require a flute. i didn't know about the 5
>mana someone else mentioned, i didn't think to look.
>
>the provocation song just pisses me off to no extent. since when does a
>bard have to target a fellow player to get the effect of their song? also,
>the player does not have to be grouped with the bard. AND the song only
>lasts one pulse, you have to refresh it like chain or bellow. this song is
>so completely un-bardlike. another wasted slot in our spellbook as far as
>i
>can tell.
>
>Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > EQ Casters reports new songs - I'm sure I missed some, but in
> > just looking
> > at the pre-50th, I see 2 very interesting entries:
> >
> > 39th:
> > Jonthan's Provocation
> > Brass, not required
> > Effect: Target: Haste, STR, ATK, Absorb Damage Shield
> >
>
> >
> > 45th:
> > Solon's Bewitching Bravura
> > Wind, required
> > Effect: Charm!!!
> >
> > Talies the Wanderer
